title: BRIEF-Eastplats Says Received Notice Of Appeal Regarding Court Dismissed Petition
text:
BRIEF-Eastplats Says Received Notice Of Appeal Regarding Court Dismissed Petition

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 03:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Eastplats Says Received Notice Of Appeal Regarding Court Dismissed Petition Sept 20 (Reuters) - Eastern Platinum Ltd : * EASTPLATS RECEIVES A NOTICE OF APPEAL REGARDING COURT DISMISSED PETITION * EASTERN PLATINUM - HAS BEEN ADVISED THAT NOTICE OF APPEAL FROM PETITIONER WAS FILED ON SEPT 17, 2019 RELATED TO ATTEMPT TO BEGIN A DERIVATIVE ACTION * EASTERN PLATINUM LTD - INTENDS TO OPPOSE APPEAL AND SEEK TO UPHOLD COURT'S EARLIER DECISION OF A DISMISSAL.

BRIEF-Eastplats Says Received Notice Of Appeal Regarding Court Dismissed Petition
description: BRIEF-Eastplats Says Received Notice Of Appeal Regarding Court Dismissed Petition
